ERRATA. 

Page 14 line 8 for five costal plates read five intercostal plates. 

........ 15 .... 16 for one intercostal plate read one irregular costal plate. 

17 .... 15 for An animal read A Crinoidal animal. 

18 .... 20 for fig. 1. and l4. reodfig. 1. to 14. 

— .... 22 for fig. 6. and 15. read fig. 6. to 15. 

„ 45 .... 4 for An animal with, read A Crinoidal animal having.
